tool_description: An api to perform mileage calculations by receiving location information.
name: Great Circle Math Api
title: Great Circle Math Api

api_list.name: Get Distance By City, State, Country In Km
api_list.description: Takes city, state, and country of both locations and returns latitude, longitude, and calculated miles in kilometers.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://great-circle-math-api.p.rapidapi.com/byLocation/byCityStateCountryKm/birmingham/al/us/sacramento/ca/us"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "great-circle-math-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://great-circle-math-api.p.rapidapi.com/byLocation/byCityStateCountryKm/{city1}/{state1}/{country1}/{city2}/{state2}/{country2}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "great-circle-math-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Distance
api_list.description: Returns the circle math distance in miles.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://great-circle-math-api.p.rapidapi.com/calculate/getDistance/33.5186/86.8104/34.0522/118.2437"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "great-circle-math-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
